message: I walk up to Noiz and watch him at work.
He just keeps typing, eyes fixed on the screen.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Nothing. Just wondering how you were doing it."

name: ノイズ
message: "You don't think I can handle it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Didn't say that. I'm just nervous. Sorry to bother you."

name: ノイズ
message: "It's fine. I don't make mistakes. You, on the other hand, better not blow it."
Still, it's my fault for interrupting him. I head back to the others.
